import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; function AccountsPage(props) { const [accType, setAccType] = useState('bank'); const [accName, setAccName] = useState(); const [accCode, setAccCode] = useState(); const [accCurrency, setAccCurency] = useState(); const [accNum, setAccNum] = useState(); const [bankName, setbankName] = useState(); const [IFSC, setIFSC] = useState(); const [description, setDescription] = useState(); const handleSubmitBankingDet = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const postData = async () => { if (accType = 'bank') { await fetch('http://localhost:8000/setbankaccount/', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ 'username': props.username, 'acc_name': accName, 'acc_code': accCode, 'currency': accCurrency, 'acc_num': accNum, 'bank_name': bankName, 'ifsc': IFSC, 'description': description }), }); } else { await fetch('http://localhost:8000/setcardaccount/', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ 'username': props.username, 'acc_name': accName, 'acc_code': accCode, 'currency': accCurrency, 'bank_name': bankName, 'description': description }), }); } } } return (<>
